arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney reveal financial woes of running Wrexham and ask fans for help
arts.sum: H ollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have offered a candid glimpse into the financial demands of running Wrexham AFC in England's soccer leagues by petitioning fans to purchase merchandise to keep the club going. The Deadpool star opens the clip by acknowledging Wrexham's recent signings, calling them "pretty legit players," while McElhenney highlights the club's future plans for a "shiny new" stadium-something Reynolds quickly labels as "expensive."

arts.ttl: Match report: Bolton Wanderers hold firm for a lunchtime point in Wrexham
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers registered a second successive 0-0 draw in the league with Wrexham in a scrappy St David's Day clash at the Racecourse.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers boss wants out-of-contract Ricardo Santos to focus on fitness
